text:
There is a missing period, and a reference to the old hame of one of the action
atribute values. Also Xdocs should reflect that only certain strings are valid
for the action atribute.

able to use action="single" or action="multi" action="record" should still work.

should read:

able to use action="single" or action="recreate". Action="record" should still work.

mentioning action="delete" might also be good.

I'll try to take care of this sometime next week. The snow storm is going to
make my upcomming week very busy. Mail me if I seem to have forgotten it :).
creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
bodewig@apache.org
text: Is the snowstorm over by now?  ;-)

creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
hmm I seem to have forgotten it ;) 

Thanks for reminding me. I'll do it this week, if we actually decide to move 1.6
to java 1.2 I will have some refactoring to do to get rid of some 1.1isms too.
Doing it all at once would be nice. (use of iterator instead of enum, etc)

creator: gus.heck@olin.edu
text:
Created attachment 5450
A patch to fix the docs as described. 1.2ifying reserved for now (per discussion on dev list)
